transcript:
Executive: Hello, ek minute.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan very good afternoon sir.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Jinshi India Mart Nanda office se.
Executive: Haan Jinshi ji boliye boliye.
Customer: Ji haan Aakesh sir bilkul theek hai aap bataiye kaise ho aap.
Executive: Main bhi badhiya hun aap bataiye.
Customer: Haan sir with sir regarding kaise hai GL stone abhi abhi ek hi hi chal raha hai GL stone na.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Iska bhi renewal aa gaya aur mujhe ek baat bataiye sir abhi next month hai na.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: To kya plan hai aapka teen saal ke liye to is bar karaenge ek hi saal ke liye karaenge.
Executive: Karwaenge bilkul continue karna hi hai. Hami hai aapke loyal customer Hyderabad mein aur kaun hai bataiye.
Customer: Nahi humse acha koi customer hai aapka Hyderabad mein.
Customer: Ji customer se wo jis se India Mart ka platform jis tarah se aap use kar rahe ho aur koi nahi kar rahe aap platform ache se utilize kar rahe hain.
Executive: Haan to wahi hai.
Customer: Haan mujhe aap catalog mein ekdum matlab hame ek gap hi nahi rakha hai buyer se connect karne ke liye ek shop aur karne se aapko aur kuch business milne ka chance hai but aap apna acha aap ek kaam kar dijiye Rajesh ji jo hai ek zoom meeting karenge aapse unko samjhaiye platform ke bare mein aur kaisa optimum utilization kar sakte hain.
Executive: To aapke agar koi available hai ya kal aap schedule kar lijiye.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Request aati hai aap.
Executive: Haan aaj bhi kar sakte hain.
Executive: Hmm aaj bhi kar sakte hain.
Customer: To mujhe aap Rajesh ji ka number dijiye.
Executive: Main aapko provide karta hun Rajesh ji ka number aap ek bar hi kar dijiye whatsapp pe main abhi bhijwata hun unko boliye Mahesh ji se baat hui hai aur jo hai ek bar aap meeting zoom meeting karke unko samjhaiye India Mart kaise chalta hai kya hai.
Executive: Fir wo usko proper utilize karenge he is highly dedicated for the India Mart only.
Customer: Ji ji maine aapko hamara whatsapp pe bhi aapka jo personal whatsapp pe bhi maine hi de diya theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main abhi bhijwata hun aapko aap call kar lijiye Rajesh ji ko.
Customer: Haan bhijwa ke puri abhi naya person naya arrange hua hai kya.
Executive: He is my younger brother. Just turn into the business.
Customer: Okay okay to sir aap usko pata se koi nahi theek hai abhi sir aayenge theek hai.
Executive: Okay done.
Customer: Okay bye thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's GL Stone renewal is due.

- Wants to know about renewal plan.

- Wants Rajesh's number for a Zoom meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive inquired about renewal plan.

- Agreed to continue the subscription.

- Executive agreed to provide Rajesh's number.

- Executive will send number on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive Rajesh's number on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, subscription, zoom meeting, catalog
